data.name: Alchemist of Pipi Forest
data.detailed_description:
When Master left the atelier, Riblo, an alchemist, suddenly began to stand alone.

Riblo explores new places Meet various people, She comes across multiple experiences.
To Riblo, who has never been outside the Pipi Forest, The outside world is full of new and mysterious things.
Will Riblo be able to safely make "Philosopher's Stone" and solve Master's homework?


【Alchemy using the Alchemy Pot】
Riblo is an alchemist who can collect various ingredients and combine items
in the alchemy pot.
The combined item can be used for the residents who need help by progressing the episode
or receiving a quest.


【Collect various materials】
Riblo explores various locations and collects new materials.
She may sometimes need alchemy-made items to get the ingredients she wants.


【Resolving requests from residents】
Riblo can solve quests with items made with alchemy.
Check out the Quest notes of residents in need on the town board of Pipi Town!


【Collect Alchemy Recipe】
Riblo can complete the recipe book by registering alchemy recipes.
Recipes can be purchased at the Pipi Town Recipe Store.


【Various episodes】
NPC of various races appear in the Alchemist of Pipi Forest.
Residents ask for help from Riblo and sometimes help Riblo.
Various episodes with Master, friends and villagers await!

- You can adjust the game to full screen with the F3 and F4 buttons,
but Due to the nature of the game, it is recommended to play in windowed mode.
- Report bugs and typos in the game to hi.kkangto@gmail.com.

F3 : Windowed background fill F4 : Full screen F5 : Reset game F12 : Screenshot

data.short_description: Alchemist of Pipiforst is a fantasy RPG game where you collect items and perform alchemy. Explore new areas, collect mysterious materials, and solve various quests. A variety of exciting episodes await you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: CPU-integrated
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
